item.title: Yes i know im noob, but i need a coder to answer these questions. LOOK PLZ
item.dc:creator: @nd_w0t nd w0t
item.description:
@nd_w0t wrote:

ok righty then, sory to trouble u guys but. i’ve been looking for a source/server (that i can run)…which has the following commands.

<> A command that when only owners with player rights = 3… can do… ::giveadmin

<> 2nd command is pretty much the same. again. player rights =3… ::givemod

<> and becoming a coder, Well rofl trying. i’ve had a little help from other people then “Eh pretty easy” posted the command i was about to mention. thats the ::unmute (username) is it anything like this…?

if (command.startsWith(“unmute”)) {
try {
String muted = command.substring(7);
int playerMuted = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(muted);
client m = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerMuted];
m.silent = 0;
m.tempmute = 0;
m.sendMessage(“A member of staff has lifted your mute, allowing you to talk again”);
sendMessage(muted+" is no longer permanently muted");
}
catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Enter the name of the player you want to unmute”);
}
}

And thats all… I would really apriciate it if someone can tell me how to do the above ^^ thanks

Read full topic
